name: git_program_builder
title: Program Builder (git)
summary: Build program from a git repo
description:
Builds your app from a git repository.

The Program Builder does the following:

* Clones your program from a git repo, optionally using credentials specified by you
* Builds your program with `./configure` and `make && make install` (optional; only run if a `./configure` file and a makefile are found, respectively)
* Uploads the resulting program object to DNAnexus and creates an App
